module.title: Info: Manual
module.description:
Viewer for documents written using Markdown.
Additionally contains editing features which need to be enabled.
Features of viewer: list> - Documents are existing as files - Markdown syntax is rendered before display using PageDown.js - Document can be stored in (nested) folders <list Features of editor: list> - Documents can be added, updated, renamed/moved or removed - List order can be managed by pushing documents up or down - Renaming a document will adjust links to this document in others <list
